question: The shake test shown below can be done to know:
exp: Shake test: - Test done to check cold damage to Vaccine due to freezing. - Once the vaccine is frozen, it tends to form flakes which gradually settle to the bottom, after the l is shaken. - Thus, sedimentation occurs faster in a vaccine l which has been frozen as compared to control l. - These ls should be discarded irrespective of their expiry date. - Used for DPT, DT, TT or Hepatitis B
opa: Whether vaccine was exposed to heat
opb: Whether vaccine had been frozen at some point of time in the cold chain
opc: Whether expiry date of vaccine has reached
opd: Whether the vaccine needs to be mixed with normal saline

question: Which of the following vaccines is most sensitive to heat?
exp: - Heat sensitive vaccines: OPV - most heat sensitive. Hence stored in freezer Reconstituted BCG Measles vaccine ***Note: For heat sensitivity: Reconstituted BCG > OPV > BCG -Light sensitive vaccines: Measles vaccine BCG Rota JE vaccine -Freeze sensitive vaccines: Hep B Pentavalent TT DPT vaccine

question: An OPV l shows this symbol on it. What does it indicate?
exp: The pictures below show the interpretation of vaccine l monitor on the OPV vaccine l: - If color of inside square lighter than outside circle - We can use the vaccine - It is heat sensitive label that indicates cumulative heat exposure over time.
opa: The vaccine has reached its expiry date
opb: The vaccine has not been stored properly
opd: Use the vaccine if expiry date not reached

question: Why are the following vaccine ls coloured?
exp: Light sensitive vaccines: - These vaccine lose their potency if exposed to bright light - Thus, these vaccines are packed in dark brown glass for protection - BCG, Measles, JE, Rotavirus are light sensitive vaccines
opa: For easy recognition of these vaccines
opc: Because these vaccines are light sensitive vaccines
opd: Because thes vaccines are darker in colour

question: The efficiency of cold chain system for oral polio vaccine as monitored by Vaccine Vial Monitor (VVM) depends on:
exp: Vaccine Vial Monitor (VVM) - Heat sensitive label that indicates cumulative heat exposure over time. - Whether the OPV l can be used or not depends upon the irreversible colour changes in vaccine l monitor. - If color of inside square lighter than outside circle - We can use the vaccine
opa: Change in the colour of vaccine
